amendment.description: To limit the availability of funds for certain purposes relating to Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4423 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4423 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6388) To limit the availability of funds for certain purposes relating to Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4423 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4423 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Biden.
